sqlMap.select: SELECT a.sched_name as schedname, a.job_name as jobname, a.job_group as jobgroup, a.description as jobdesc, a.job_class_name as jobclass, a.is_durable as durable, a.is_nonconcurrent as nonconcurrent, a.is_update_data as isUpdateData, a.requests_recovery as requestsRec, b.trigger_name as triname, b.trigger_group as trigroup, b.trigger_state as state, b.next_fire_time as nT, b.prev_fire_time as pT, b.start_time as sT, b.end_time as eT FROM qrtz_job_details a, qrtz_triggers b WHERE a.sched_name = b.sched_name AND a.job_name = b.job_name AND a.job_group = b.job_group AND b.trigger_name = 'tri_'||a.job_name

SELECT a.sched_name as schedname, a.job_name as jobname, a.job_group as jobgroup, a.description as jobdesc, a.job_class_name as jobclass, a.is_durable as durable, a.is_nonconcurrent as nonconcurrent, a.is_update_data as isUpdateData, a.requests_recovery as requestsRec, b.trigger_type as tritype, b.trigger_name as triname, b.trigger_group as trigroup, b.trigger_state as state, b.next_fire_time as nT, b.prev_fire_time as pT, b.start_time as sT, b.end_time as eT FROM qrtz_job_details a, qrtz_triggers b WHERE a.sched_name = b.sched_name AND a.job_name = b.job_name AND a.job_group = b.job_group AND a.job_name = #job_name# AND a.job_group = #job_group# AND b.trigger_name = 'tri_'||#job_name# AND b.trigger_group = #trigger_group#
SELECT a.cron_expression FROM qrtz_cron_triggers a WHERE a.trigger_name = 'tri_'||#job_name# AND a.trigger_group = #trigger_group#
SELECT a.repeat_count, a.repeat_interval FROM qrtz_simple_triggers a WHERE a.trigger_name = 'tri_'||#job_name# AND a.trigger_group = #trigger_group#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO qrtz_job_log( log_id, job_name, address, service_id, fired_time, success, log_msg )VALUES( #log_id#, #job_name#, #address#, #service_id#, #fired_time#, #success#, #log_msg# )
sqlMap.select:
SELECT log_id, job_name, address, service_id, fired_time, success, log_msg FROM qrtz_job_log WHERE 1 = 1
LOWER(job_name) = LOWER(#job_name:VARCHAR#)
address like #address:VARCHAR#||'%'
LOWER(service_id) = LOWER(#service_id:VARCHAR#)
success = #success:VARCHAR#
fired_time >= #start_time:TIMESTAMP#
fired_time <= #end_time:TIMESTAMP#
ORDER BY fired_time DESC

SELECT log_id, job_name, address, service_id, fired_time, success, log_msg FROM QRTZ_JOB_LOG WHERE log_id = #log_id:VARCHAR# AND FIRED_TIME = ( SELECT MAX (FIRED_TIME) FROM QRTZ_JOB_LOG WHERE JOB_NAME = #job_name:VARCHAR#)
